jira.description: Jira integration for sprint management, backlog grooming, issue tracking, velocity metrics, and burndown charts. Used by plan-sprint, milestone-track, sprint-health review, and status-report workflows.

confluence.description: Confluence integration for publishing meeting notes, project charters, risk registers, retrospective records, status dashboards, and stakeholder communication logs.

slack.description: Slack integration for posting daily standups, 3P updates, blocker alerts, milestone notifications, and stakeholder communications. Reads team channels for progress gathering.

google-calendar.description: Google Calendar integration for scheduling sprint ceremonies (planning, review, retro, standups), milestone due date tracking, and stakeholder review cadence management.
